NAME: Alexa
NAME_DESC: Amazon developers chose the name Alexa because it has a hard consonant with the X, which helps it be recognized with higher precision. They have said the name is reminiscent of the Library of Alexandria, which is also used by Amazon Alexa Internet for the same reason
ARTICLES: Just ASK: Building an Architecture for Extensible Self-Service Spoken Language Understanding - Anjishnu Kumar et al (2018)
